Pre-Game Insights: England has been playing tough series against the West Indies and dominated Pakistan at home.
Scotland has shown consistent improvement and has been one of the most exciting associate teams in the world.
The match is a crucial start for both teams in the T20 World Cup 2024 campaign.
George Munsey will be the lynchpin of Scotland's lineup with an aggressive style and quick scoring ability against spin.
Mark Watt will be crucial for Scotland with his change of pace and trademark 24-yard ball.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be held at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown.
The weather report for June 3, 2024 is not provided but is expected to affect the match.
The match will have live ball-by-ball commentary available on SportsTiger.
